requirements.summary: Wrap the App component with I18nProvider in frontend/src/main.tsx to resolve the 'useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider' error
acceptanceCriteria: I18nProvider wraps the App component in the component tree
Application loads without i18n provider errors
Multi-language support (Turkish, English) continues to function correctly

file_operations.description: Add I18nProvider as a wrapper between InternetIdentityProvider and App component. Import I18nProvider from frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx. Ensure the provider hierarchy follows: QueryClientProvider > InternetIdentityProvider > I18nProvider > App. This provides the i18n context to all components using the useI18n hook, resolving the 'useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider' error while preserving existing QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.

requirements.summary: Ensure I18nProvider is imported from frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx in main.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: I18nProvider import statement is present and correct
No import errors occur during build or runtime

file_operations.description: Add the import statement for I18nProvider at the top of the file alongside other provider imports. Import from the correct path: frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx. Ensure the import uses the correct named export syntax.

requirements.summary: Verify that the component hierarchy in main.tsx correctly places I18nProvider between QueryClientProvider and App component
acceptanceCriteria: Provider hierarchy follows the pattern: QueryClientProvider > InternetIdentityProvider > I18nProvider > App
All child components can access i18n context without errors

file_operations.description: Restructure the component tree to nest I18nProvider between InternetIdentityProvider and App. The final hierarchy must be: QueryClientProvider wraps InternetIdentityProvider, which wraps I18nProvider, which wraps App. This ensures all child components have access to both authentication and internationalization contexts in the correct order.
